text: This article lists the Ministers of State () in the Duchy of Anhalt from 1863 to 1918 and Ministers-President () of the Free State of Anhalt from 1918 to 1945. ==Ministers of State of the Duchy of Anhalt== *1863–1868: Carl Friedrich Ferdinand Sintenis *1868–1875: Karl August Alfred von Larisch *1875–1892: Anton von Krosigk *1892–1902: Kurt von Koseritz *1903–1909: Nikolaus Michael Louis Hans von Dallwitz *1910–1918: Ernst Laue *1918: Max Gutknecht ==Ministers-President of the Free State of Anhalt== Political Party: {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%; border:1px #AAAAFF solid" |- !width=80px rowspan=2 colspan=2|Portrait !width=30% rowspan=2|Name !width=35% colspan=3|Term of Office !width=28% rowspan=2|Political Party |- !Took Office !Left Office !Days |- | style="background:;" | |80px |Max Gutknecht |8 November 1918 |14 November 1918 | |Non-partisan |- | style="background:;" | |80px |Wolfgang Heine |14 November 1918 |23 July 1919 | |Social Democratic Party of Germany |- | style="background:;" | |80px |Heinrich Deist |23 July 1919 |9 July 1924 | |Social Democratic Party of Germany |- | style="background:;" | |80px |R. Willi Knorr |9 July 1924 |25 November 1924 | |German National People's Party |- | style="background:;" | |80px |Heinrich Deist |25 November 1924 |21 May 1932 | |Social Democratic Party of Germany |- | style="background:;" | |80px |Alfred Freyberg |21 May 1932 |8 January 1940 | |National Socialist German Workers' Party |- | rowspan="2" style="background:;" | |rowspan="2"|80px |rowspan="2"|Friedrich Wilhelm Loeper ! colspan="2"| |rowspan="2"| |rowspan="2"|National Socialist German Workers' Party |- |5 May 1933 |23 October 1935 |- | rowspan="2" style="background:;" | |rowspan="2"|80px |rowspan="2"|Fritz Sauckel ! colspan="2"| |rowspan="2"| |rowspan="2"|National Socialist German Workers' Party |- |October 1935 |20 April 1937 |- | rowspan="4" style="background:;" | |rowspan="4"|80px |rowspan="4"|Rudolf Jordan ! colspan="2"| |rowspan="2"| |rowspan="4"|National Socialist German Workers' Party |- |20 April 1937 |April 1945 |- ! colspan="2"| |rowspan="2"| |- |8 January 1940 |April 1945 |} ==See also== *List of Ministers-President of Saxony-Anhalt ==External links== *Worldstatesmen.org – Duchy of Anhalt and Free State of Anhalt Ministers-President Anhalt Ministers-President of Anhalt *
